backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature-to-file mappings and metadata for the Valentine experience.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptive summaries for key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup and OKLCH color variables for UI theming.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document that mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders ValentinePage as the app’s sole view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base plus romantic Valentine theme colors and floating-heart animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React, wrapping App with InternetIdentityProvider and react-query client.
frontend/src/pages/ValentinePage.tsx: Main Valentine UI with evasive 'No' button, 'Yes' success state, floating hearts, and cat image display.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, defining content paths, and extending theme with custom colors, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Project state file outlining requirements and features for a romantic Valentine React page with Yes/No interaction and a success cat image.
